step_template_name: Search for Videos by Priority Topics

parent_task.task_name: Search and Score Videos Using 0-100 System

step_details.detail: Use search queries from instructions, filter by last 30-60 days, 10-40 min duration, find 8-12 videos

outputs: 8-12 videos with URLs, titles, creators, dates, durations
execution.success_criteria: Minimum 8 videos found, all within date and duration requirements
